title: Must Watch: Commencal x Paul Couderc My War 2 premiere
content:
The original My War featuring freerider Paul Couderc began like this: Paul standing one-legged on a high, narrow platform holding his Commencal slope style bike. He then leaps into a back flip, bike in hands, mounts the bike mid-air and lands on a down slope. In that 2019 edit, Paul cracked out not one but […]

The post Must Watch: Commencal x Paul Couderc My War 2 premiere appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
